DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and feasibility of the Chartis System in measuring air flow and pressures in isolated lung compartments in emphysema patients prior to endobronchial lung volume reduction (ELVR).
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Feasibility Study of the Chartis System With Heterogeneous Emphysema Prior to Endobronchial Lung Volume Reduction (ELVR)
DOC.criteria: Heterogeneous emphysema as determined by highresolution CT scan Scheduled for clinically indicated ELVR procedure Hyperexcretive chronic bronchitis or excessive sputum secretion Active pulmonary infection Active asthma or lung hyperresponsiveness
